mapper.insert: INSERT INTO litter_event (petId, detectedAt, type, confidence, visualSignals, anomalies, notes, sourceVideo, logId) VALUES (#{petId}, #{detectedAt}, #{type}, #{confidence}, CAST(#{visualSignalsJson} AS JSON), CAST(#{anomaliesJson} AS JSON), #{notes}, #{sourceVideo}, #{logId})
mapper.select: SELECT id, petId, detectedAt, type, confidence, CAST(visualSignals AS CHAR) AS visualSignalsJson, CAST(anomalies AS CHAR) AS anomaliesJson, notes, sourceVideo, logId FROM litter_event WHERE petId = #{petId} ORDER BY detectedAt DESC, id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
